name: Bet Brawl
description:
-BEST PLAYED ON FULL SCREEN-

Hi everyone and welcome to my GMTK Game Jam entry.

This time, the theme  was Roll of the Dice and I made a very simple 3v3 turn based game with luck as the main mechanic.

RULES

-At the start of the round you get to roll a Giant Dice that will award you chips based on it's number. 

-You can bet if the dice will show an even or an odd number or alternatively you could not bet at all . 

-If you win the bet you will be awarded Double the amount of chips, but if you lose the bet you will get only Half of the chips you were suppose to be getting.

-After the roll  the turns will take place, cycling  between all the characters and showing the available Abilities . 

-Each ability will require a certain Amount of chips to be performed (if you don't have any Chips you can press the little arrow in the right to pass the current character turn). 

-When you press on an ability arrows will appear showing the available targets of that ability.

ABILITIES

-Abilities require a click on the ability itself and then, while selected, another click on a target (Available Targets will be indicated using a floating arrow above their heads )-

Fist = Melee Attack 

Gun = Ranged Attack 

Shield = Guard (Increased Defense)

Cross = Heal an Alley

Arrow = Pass the Current Character's Turn
